Package org.deidentifier.arx.masking

This package provides a variety of tools for data masking.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IDictionaryMasker<T>
    Performs data masking on a whole dictionary of data of type T.
    IInstanceMasker<T>
    Performs data masking on single instances of data of type T.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractDictionaryMasker<T>
    Performs data masking on whole dictionaries of data of type T.
    AbstractInstanceMasker<T>
    Performs data masking on single instances of data of type T.
    AbstractInstBasedDictMasker<T>
    Performs data masking on a dictionary of values of type T by applying instance masking on each value.
    AbstractReplaceInstMasker<T>
    Performs data masking by replacing the input data with new values for each data instance, generated independently from the input.
    ConstantShiftDateMasker
    Masks date instances by adding a constant time period.
    ConstantShiftDecimalMasker
    Masks instances of decimal data by adding a constant value.
    GenerateRandomDateMasker
    A masker that generates random dates using a given probability distribution and base date.
    GenerateRandomDecimalMasker
    A masker that generates random decimals by sampling from a given probability distribution.
    GenerateRandomIntegerDecimalMasker
    A masker that generates random integers in decimal format, using a given probability distribution.
    GenerateRandomStringMasker
    A masker that generates random strings according to a set of user-specified rules.
    MatchAndReplaceStringMasker
    A masker that tries to find matches in the input strings using a given regex pattern and replaces found matches with a user-specified replacement string.
    Random
    Provides quick access to an alternative random number generator used instead of the standard RNG Random, because of its mediocre statistical qualities.
    RandomShiftDateMasker
    A masker that shifts dates randomly according to a given probability distribution.
    RandomShiftDecimalMasker
    A masker that shifts decimal numbers randomly according to a given probability distribution.
    ReplaceDictMasker<T>
    Replaces the list of input data with the provided replacement list.
    ReplaceDictMasker.ReplaceDateDictMasker  
    ReplaceDictMasker.ReplaceDecimalDictMasker  
    ReplaceDictMasker.ReplaceStringDictMasker  
    ReplaceInstMasker<T>
    Replaces the input data with a constant replacement value.
    ReplaceInstMasker.ReplaceDateInstMasker  
    ReplaceInstMasker.ReplaceDecimalInstMasker  
    ReplaceInstMasker.ReplaceStringInstMasker  
    ShuffleMasker<T>
    Masks a dictionary of data by shuffling its values around.
    ShuffleMasker.ShuffleDateMasker  
    ShuffleMasker.ShuffleDecimalMasker  
    ShuffleMasker.ShuffleStringMasker  
    SplitAndReplaceStringMasker
    A masker that splits up the input strings into groups by matching delimiters in it.

Package org.deidentifier.arx.masking Description

This package provides a variety of tools for data masking.
